vision.notes: Sensory capabilities in this family are largely undocumented in the provided context. Vision may be present but cannot be confirmed.

chemoreception.notes: Chemoreception is likely present in this marine gastropod family, but further research is required to confirm.

mechanoreception.notes: Mechanoreception, including tactile and balance senses, are likely present in this marine gastropod family, but further research is required to confirm.
